description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. There's a radiation problem in the lab and you need to clean it up with Melvin's machine! Play in one or two player modes on multiple difficulties in this fast paced match 3 game.
description.short: There's a radiation problem in the lab and you need to clean it up with Melvin's machine! Play in one or two player modes on multiple difficulties in this fast paced match 3 game.
